parties: To investigate the climate impacts of positive Atlantic Multidecadal Variability (AMV) anomalies.

name: Impose SST AMV pos extra tropical N Atlantic
rationale: DCPP, SST, imposed, AMV+, positive AMV, positive Atlantic Multidecadal Variability anomaly, extra-tropical north Atlantic
longName: Impose positive AMV anomaly to sea surface temperatures in the extra-tropical north Atlantic
